DOC.brief_summary: This study compare grade glucose infusion ( GGI ) hyperglycemic clamp ( HGC ) assessment glucose-dependent insulin secretion ( GDIS ) use exenatide probe .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Methodologies Assessing Glucose-Dependent Insulin Secretion ( 0000-104 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Subject Body Mass Index ( BMI ) less equal 26 kg/m2 screen Subject judge good health Subject nonsmoker least 3 month Subject willing avoid strenuous physical activity duration study Subject history high blood pressure require treatment Subject history diabetes family history diabetes mellitus Subject unable discontinue prescription nonprescription drug duration study Subject consume 3 alcoholic beverage per day Subject consume 6 serving caffeinated beverage per day ( 1 serve = 120mg caffeine ) Subject major surgery donate loss 1 unit blood within 4 week screen Subject multiple and/or severe allergy food drug Subject regular user illegal drug Subject unwilling unable consume standardize meal study and/or carbohydrate restrict diet
